resources.string: Wicker is still in it\'s infancy and more features are in the works! If you have any suggestions, you may reach us at ...
Easily save a quotable statement from an app that allows you to highlight the text then share it to Wicker.

Found a quote that resonates with you? Read a statement in an article that sparked your interest? Or is it a lyrics from a song that spoke volumes? Then save it here!\n\nWicker is a collection of quotes that are handpicked by you. Make it yours.
